title: Bought two rune pages, got charged, didn't get them.
body: This was about 3 days ago. It charged my the IP, but I never got my rune pages.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

If you've purchased content and didn't receive it, please submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584), so we can take a look at your account and resolve the issue. :]

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=6QZkMxGa,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-06T17:38:16.323+0000)
>
> Hiya! 
> 
> If you've purchased content and didn't receive it, please submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584), so we can take a look at your account and resolve the issue. :]

I submitted a ticket when it happened.
